ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 3 Date: Fri, 29 Mar 2002 03:04:30 -0000 From: mlockridge01  Subject: Level to attain For those who use Alahkhazam, what is your
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 3
   Date: Fri, 29 Mar 2002 03:04:30 -0000
   From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>
Subject: Level to attain

For those who use Alahkhazam, what is your take on the "Level to
attain" recommendation? Is it a recommendation for a group quest, or
solo? If it is a group recommendation, how much do you think it
should be bumped up for a solo quest?

Barto Proudfoot
lvl 31 Halfling Druid
Zeb server

I've found that Allakhazam's recommendations are close to right for a solo, sometimes you can do the stuff at lower level but not always. For example, the trader quest in Shadowhaven can be done at level 1 if you want to, just gotta run like the wind thru to Fungus Grove. Usually you can do the quest by yourself, unless it involves killing 3 or more at a time.  I usually attempt the quest myself and if I have trouble I work on my guildies for help.  Good luck
 
 
Bebinn Maolcataig
34 Woodelf Ranger
Bristlebane
